AS A GLADIATOR TRIUMPHS OVER A GIANT SQUID
The first gnolls arose from hyenas that fed on flesh tainted by the Abyss. Their corruption and violence delighted the demon lord Yeenoghu, who
encouraged their numbers and spread them across the multiverse. Ever since, gnolls have been the cackling servants of Yeenoghu, existing to cause ruin
and to feast on what remains.
Gnoll Warrior
Gnoll warriors crave endless slaughter but quickly grow bored with the prey they kill and the treasures they plunder. Nevertheless, they’re enraged by the
thought of anyone else having what’s theirs, compelling them to ruin what they can’t take with them.
Gnoll Pack Lord
Rising above other gnolls with their viciousness and physical prowess, gnoll pack lords terrorize weaker gnolls into their service. These brutes drive other
gnolls to acts of great violence, then claim the best of their servants’ spoils.
GNOLL WARRIORS RAMPAGE AFTER A GNOLL PACK LORD, A GNOLL FANG OF YEENOGHU, AND A GNOLL DEMONIAC
